iproxy_client.h
===============

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`Registry <registry.md>`__

**Description:**

Provides the client proxy class.

When you need to call system capabilities of other processes, obtain the
class from Samgr.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------
